welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rotherham, a charming town known for its rich industrial history and picturesque countryside. We invite you to explore our historic landmarks and enjoy the warm hospitality of our community.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
